title: Spotify Playlist Converter
description: A tool that allows you to extract your favorite songs from spotify to create a playlist on youtube.

title: Racing Game
description: A pygame based interactive racing game with animations, level system, and real-time screen updates.

title: PDF Templates
description: A script that generates PDF templates of multiple pages given some predefined guidelines.

title: Chatbot
description: A chatbot modeled after Diogenes the Cynic, offering users an interactive experience to engage with the legendary philosopher's wit, wisdom, and provocative worldview.

title: Facial recognition
description: A Python script that detects a person's facial emotion and engages in a mood-aware conversation based on their detected expression.

title: Motion Detector Camera
description: A security surveillance program that monitors and records footage.

title: A* Visualizer
description: A python script that allows you to generate a grid on which you can visualize a pathfinding scenario using A* algorithm.

title: Student Management System
description: A desktop PyQt6 GUI app for managing university student data with an SQL database backend.
